name: Export Category Posts (PDF)
author: Saeid M.Rezaei

sections.description:
Fill the form and click on Export PDF button, All thing you need to generate PDF from your posts by category!

Available options:
– PDF File name : In English, no trailing .pdf, leave blank for auto filename
– Category
– Posts : Max 400 recommended, more than 400 you must wait a long time to proceed
– Offset : Number of post(s) to displace or pass over
– Order : by date (Descending or Ascending)

RTL and UTF-8 is supported!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/export-pdf-category-posts directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Tools->Export Category Posts (PDF) screen to configure the plugin

short_description: Export all posts from specific category to a PDF file.
